text: The 2013 Stockholm riots started on 19 May 2013 in the Husby area of Stockholm, Sweden. The riots led to several injuries. They happened in response to the fatal shooting of a 69-year-old man by Stockholm police. The incident was ongoing as of May 28. Stockholm riots Category:2013 in Sweden Category:2010s in Stockholm Category:Riots in Europe Category:2010s riots Category:Crime in Sweden Category:May 2013 events
title: 2013 Stockholm riots
